author: adilabd
title: Incrypture - Pooling DeFi
description: The cambrian explosion of DeFi protocols has no simple way to pool disparate on-chain loans together to diversify protocol risk.
solution: Develop pooling function of securitization on Cardano, so that DeFi investors can more easily allocate to different protocols together.
experience: Mathematicians, computer scientists, structured finance specialists and an SPO that have traded Mortgage Backed Securities extensively.
